name: Drow Ranger
title: Traxex
lore: Drow Ranger's given name is Traxex—a name which means 'fearful' in Elvish, owing to her crippling shyness.

frostArrows.name: Frost Arrows
frostArrows.description: Adds a frost effect to attacks that slows the target.

gust.name: Gust
gust.description: Releases a wave of silence that pushes back and silences enemies.

multishot.name: Multishot
multishot.description: Drow fires a barrage of arrows at enemies in a cone.

marksmanship.name: Marksmanship
marksmanship.description: Drow's focus allows her attacks to sometimes pierce through enemies. Disabled when enemies are too close.
